property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark and Fire schools. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Fireweaving: Once per round, at the end of her Action Phase, the Warlock may target an object up to 2 zones away. She may move a Burn conditon from that object to another target object in that same zone. Smoldering Curses: Enemy creatures gain the Flame +1 trait if they have one or more revealed curse you control attached to them. Demonic Reward: If a friednly demon attacks and damages an enemy creature with a Burn condition, it may heal one damage. Each friendly demon may only trigger this ability once per round.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the War and Earth schools of Magic. Arcane spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value:
Runesmithing: When an equipment comes into play attached to this mage, he may pay 1 mana to assign one Rune to it. If this equipment would be destroyed by a spell or ability an opponent controls, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana. Each rune may only be assigned once per game.
Battle Orders: Once per round, the Warlord may pay 1 mana and cast one of the following quick command spells. The chosen spell affects all friendly soldiers in his zone at the time it is cast, and the effect last until the end of the round.
Take Aim! - Ranged attacks gain Piercing +2; Quick March! - Gain Fast trait; Hold the Line! - Gain Armor +1 and Tough -2 traits. Battle Hardened: Warlord has the Tough -2 trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Nature school. Fire spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Quick Summoning: Once per round, the Beastmaster may summon a Level 1 Animal creature as a quick spell. PET: When a friendly non-Legendary animal creature comes into play, you may make it your Pet. Pay mana equal to the creatures Level +1, then place the Pet maker on it. Pet gains Melee +1, Armor +1, and Life +3. Whenever Pet is in the same zone as his Beastmaster, it gains an additional Melee +1. If Pet is destroyed, you may assign the marker again in the same manner when a new animal is summond.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Nature school. Fire spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Nature Magic. Fire spells cost triple SBP.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Nature school and Level 1 of the Water School. Fire and War spells cost triple.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Spreading Vines: During the Deployment Phase, you may place a Vine marker in a zone. Whenever you, or an object you control, casts a Vine spell, you may target a zone containing a friendly Vine marker, or target an object in that zone, or a border of that zone. Then, destroy that marker. TREEBOND: When a friend tree conjuration comes into play you may choose to bond with it. Place your Treebond marker on it, You gain Innate Life +4 and Channel +1. The gains Innate Life +4, Armor +1, and Lifebond +2. If the tree is destroyed, the Treebond marker is permanently destroyed.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Nature magic and level 1 Water spells. Fire and War spells cost triple spellpoints, even if Novice.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Herbalist. Once per round, when you cast a potion, you may pay 1 mana to place 1 additional Charge token on it.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Air, Earth, Fire and Water Schools. Living objects cost triple spellpoints

property.name: MageSchoolCost
property.value: Air=1, Earth=1, Fire=1, Water=1, War=3, Nature=3, Holy=3, Arcane=3, Dark=3, Mind=3

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Air, Earth, Fire and Water Schools. Living objects cost triple spellpoints, even if Novice.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Mind school of Magic. Non-Mind creature spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Deflect: The Forcemaster uses telekinesis to deflect attacks. She has a Defense which can be used once per round, and avoids attacks on a roll of 7+. She must pay 1 mana each time she uses this Defense (before rolling for the Defense). This Defense uses its own unique ready marker "Deflect". Force Pull: Once per round, she may cast this quick force spell. Target creature is Pushed 1 zone TOWARDS her. Will not Push a creature through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Mind magic and Dsjer-Tet spells. Non-Mind, Non-Dsjer-Tet creature spells cost triple SBP.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Nature School. Fire Spells cost triple during spell book construction

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Wounded Prey: Once per round, before or after any friendly creature Action Phase, she may place her Wounded Prey marker on an enemy damaged non-Mage Living Creature. She, and all friendly animal creatures gain the melee +1 trait when attacking this creature. The marker is returned to her if the creature has no damage on it, or is destroyed. Sprinting: She has the Fast trait. Archery Skill: She has the Ranged +1 trait for all of her non-spell ranged attacks.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Trained in the Mind school as well as martial and monk spells. Creature spells in which the Monk is not trained, cost triple spellbook points.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Trained in the Mind school as well as martial and monk spells. Creature spells in which the Monk is not trained, cost triple spellbook points.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark School of Magic. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Plague Master: The Necromancer has the Poison Immunity trait. During the Upkeep Phase, for each object with one or more poison condition markers on it. the Necromancer may pay 1 mana to place 1 direct poison damage on that object. Eternal Servant: When a friendly non-Legendary, non-Epic, undead creature comes into play, you may make it your Eternal Servant. Its attacks gain Piercing +1. Place the Eternal Servant marker on it. If this creature is destroyed, you may pay mana equal to its casting cost to Reanimate it. You may place the marker on this creature again when it comes into play, or save it to reassign.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Dark magic and Dsjer-Tet spells. Holy spells cost triple spellpoints, even if Novice.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Once per round, when an enemy Living creature is destroyed, you may remove up to 2 damage from a mummy creature you control

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in Holy level 3, War level 2, and all Holy Creatures. Dark Spells cost triple.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities: Valor; Once per round, when the Paladin melee attacks and damages the strongest enemy creature, he gains 1 Valor. Divine Auras As a quick action, the Paladin may gain an aura of his choice. Each aura has its own cost in Valor. Chivalrous Challenge During the Upkeep Phase, the Paladin may place his Challenge Marker on a target enemy creature within 2 zones. Once per round, the Paladin and his Challenged enemy may re-roll any number of their attack dice while melee attacking each other. If the Challenged enemy attacks any other object, gain 1 Valor. When the Challenged enemy is destroyed, return the marker to the Paladin. During the Upkeep Phase you may pay 2 Valor to return the Challenge marker from an enemy creature.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Trained in the Mind school as well as martial and monk spells. Creature spells in which the Monk is not trained, cost triple spellbook points.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained In the Holy school. Dark spells cost triple during spellbook construction. The Priest counts a "Priestess" - using spells which say Priestess Only.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Hand of Purification;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);damage type=Light;dice=2;effects={9: ['Daze']};Ethereal=True

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Holy Avenger: When a friendly non-Legendary Holy creature comes into play you may make it your Holy Avenger. Pay mana equal to its Level +1, and place the Holy Avenger marker on It. It gains +5 Life. Each round, the first time it attacks an enemy creature who attacked and damaged another friendly creature or Holy conjuration that round, it gains Melee +2 and Piercing +1 for that attack. If it is destroyed, you may assign the marker again in the same manner. Malakai's Fire: Once per round, 4 the Priest attacks and damages an enemy creature with an attack which deals light damage, he may pay 1 mana to place a Burn condition on that creature.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Holy school. Dark spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Divine Reward: Once per round, if the Priestess casts and resolves a Holy incantation spell, or reveals a Holy enchantment spell that she controls, she gains 1 life. Restore: As a quick spell, the Priestess can remove one condition marker from a friendly creature up to 1 zone away by paying its removal cost. As a full action spell, she can remove as many condition markers as she wishes from that creature by paying their removal costs.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Holy school. Dark spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Holy Magic. Dark spells cost triple SBP.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Water school, as well as pirate and song spells.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities: Siren's Call: As a Psychic Song quick spell the Siren may pay 1 mana to place her Siren's Call marker on target non-Mage creature within 2 zones. During its action phase that creature MUST move at least 1 zone closer to the Siren, if possible, and may not attack her. Return the marker at the end their Action Phase. Friendly aquatic creatures also gain Melee +2. Fermata: The Siren may extend an expiring song she controls by paying mana equal to its Level and placing a Fermata marker on it. The Siren may only have two songs affected by Fermata markers at a time, and each song may only be extended a maximum of up to 2 rounds. Amphibious: The Siren gains Regenerate 1 while in zones with aquatic terrain attached.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark and Fire schools. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Curseweaving: Once per round, if a creature is destroyed that has 1 or more curse spells you control attached to it, you may return one of those spells to your spellbook, instead of placing it in your discard pile. Blood Reaper: When a friendly non-Legendary demon creature comes into play, you may make it your Bloodreaper. Warlock loses Life equal to the creature's Level +1, then places the Bloodreaper marker on it. Bloodreaper gains the Bloodthirsty +2 trait. The first time each round that it attacks and damages a Living creature, the Warlock may heal 2 damage. If it is destroyed, you may assign the marker in the same manner when a new demon is summoned. Battle Skill: Warlock has the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark and Fire schools. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Dark Magic. Holy spells cost triple SBP.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the War and Earth schools of Magic. Arcane spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Veterans: Whenever a friendly non-Mage creature melee attacks and destroys an enemy creature, place a veteran badge token on that creature (maximum of one token per creature). That creature gains Melee +1 and Armor +1. Battle Orders: Once per round, the Warlord may pay 1 mana and cast one of the following quick command spells. The chosen spell affects all friendly soldiers in his zone at the time it is cast and the effect lasts until the end of the round. To Battle! - Gain charge +1 trait; Release Volley! - Gain Ranged +1 trait; On Guard! - Gain Melee +1 and Armor +1 while guarding. Battle Skill: Warlord has Melee +1 trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Arcane school, and an elemental school of his choice: Fire, Earth, Air, or Water.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Voltaric Shield: Each Upkeep Phase, the Wizard may pay 2 mana to activate his Voltaric Shield (flip the shield marker to the ON side). The first time the Wizard is attacked and dealt damage this round, if the shield is on, flip the shield marker to the off side, and cancel up to 3 points of damage. If the shield marker is still on at then end of the round, flip it to the off side.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Arcane school, and an elemental school of his choice: Fire, Earth, Air, or Water.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Arcane and Air Magic.
